Detailed Description

Member Enumeration Documentation

◆ task_flags

enum bm::task_descr::task_flags
Enumerator
no_flag 

no flag specified

barrier_ok 

barrier waits all prev.tasks done without error

barrier_any 

barrier waits all prev tasks done (success or not)

barrier_ok_delayed
